Properties

Xenosynth.Web.CmsHttpContext Class Reference

The CmsHttpContext provides quick access to resources and methods for the context of a current http request. More...

Collaboration diagram for Xenosynth.Web.CmsHttpContext:
[legend]

List of all members.

Properties

CmsFile CmsFile [get]
 Returns the CmsFile that matches the URL of the current request. If no CmsFile matches the URL, it returns null.
bool IsDynamicPath [get]
 Whether the current request contains a dynamic path. A dynamic path is passed as a parameter to a request handler.
string DynamicPath [get]
 If the current request path is dynamic, this is the parameterized portion of the path.
string FilePath [get]
 The file path. If the request is dynamic, this is the file portion of the path.
CmsPage CmsPage [get]
 This method will be deprecated. Returns the current CmsFile casted to a CmsPage.
CmsMode Mode [get, set]
 The CmsMode of the current http request.
static CmsHttpContext Current [get]
 The CmsHttpContext for the current http request.
CmsState SearchScopeLowerBound [get]
 The lowest state of a CmsFile allowed based on the current request's mode.
CmsState SearchScopeUpperBound [get]
 The highest state of a CmsFile allowed based on the current request's mode.

Detailed Description

The CmsHttpContext provides quick access to resources and methods for the context of a current http request.

Property Documentation

CmsFile Xenosynth.Web.CmsHttpContext.CmsFile [get]

Returns the CmsFile that matches the URL of the current request. If no CmsFile matches the URL, it returns null.

CmsPage Xenosynth.Web.CmsHttpContext.CmsPage [get]

This method will be deprecated. Returns the current CmsFile casted to a CmsPage.

CmsHttpContext Xenosynth.Web.CmsHttpContext.Current [static, get]

The CmsHttpContext for the current http request.

string Xenosynth.Web.CmsHttpContext.DynamicPath [get]

If the current request path is dynamic, this is the parameterized portion of the path.

string Xenosynth.Web.CmsHttpContext.FilePath [get]

The file path. If the request is dynamic, this is the file portion of the path.

bool Xenosynth.Web.CmsHttpContext.IsDynamicPath [get]

Whether the current request contains a dynamic path. A dynamic path is passed as a parameter to a request handler.

CmsMode Xenosynth.Web.CmsHttpContext.Mode [get, set]

The CmsMode of the current http request.

CmsState Xenosynth.Web.CmsHttpContext.SearchScopeLowerBound [get]

The lowest state of a CmsFile allowed based on the current request's mode.

CmsState Xenosynth.Web.CmsHttpContext.SearchScopeUpperBound [get]

The highest state of a CmsFile allowed based on the current request's mode.
